website_summaries.verdict: These aren't the cheapest smart bulbs you can buy, but Osram's Lightify LED Starter Kit is more affordable than Philips or Belkin's, and arguably more feature-rich, too. As a legitimate competitor, it deserves consideration.
pros: Osram's tunable Lightify LEDs offer smart color-temperature controls that you won't find with Belkin WeMo or Philips Hue Lux bulbs
They're also highly efficient, and they work with WeMo, too
cons: Osram can't offer a connected-lighting platform or app that's as well-developed as Philips, and its LEDs cost twice as much as smart bulbs from Cree and GE

customer_reviews.title: more issues with the bridge than without
customer_reviews.text: bridge is quite slow, I have a simple “on when motion” routine in Alexa. Lights Turn On Fast - lights connected to Echo Plus directly Lights Turn On Slow - lights connected to bridge and setup as a scene in lightify app This might be an issue of firmware in lights and not the bridge itself, I didn’t test direct connection after I got the bridge. Additionally lightify app UI is quite clunky, it takes some time to figure out what is what. Lights were turning on way smoother before I’ve updated firmware via lightify app.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Smart bulb app seems immature
customer_reviews.text: Can't get lights to work directly via Google Home. Lightify software is pretty limited. Support seemed to be from a developer - instructions were incoherent and complicated when trying to integrate with Google hub or Smart Life. I'm using them as dumb bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: K.Gagnier

customer_reviews.title: if you have trouble, try another plug.
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble getting the router to work, when I changed where it was plugged in, now working. Odd, was near the dsl router and didn't like that. Works better away from the dsl router. I thought I ordered a color light, my error, but it's fine since I do use white lights too.
customer_reviews.author: Russ G.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the headache....
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the Gateway to stay connected. Kept having to plug in passwords and go back and forth in the app. After fighting with this, and the Gardenspot, I am sending them back to Amazon. Very disappointing. Was really looking forward to using the Gardenspot and bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Smith

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product with a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine J Sena

customer_reviews.title: Does what I tell it to do..
customer_reviews.text: I love the bulbs. Works well with phone or ok Google and Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: jeff moran

customer_reviews.text: I had to Return this Product, it would not Connect to WiFi or Osram's App is not Working Very POOR. Its hard to rate a product what does not Work they way it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Njoy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to email osram to unlock the gateway. After they unlocked it, works flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: tdawley

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for me
customer_reviews.text: Read horrible reviews on this. It's worked great for me.... Have not to reconnect once. Couple months of using so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Q

customer_reviews.title: ... is a bit quirky however tech support was very good.
customer_reviews.text: Product is a bit quirky however tech support was very good.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: These lights are fun!
customer_reviews.text: I used the leds for my fish tank. These lights are fun!
customer_reviews.author: delaroo

customer_reviews.title: App for remote control never worked-but good for just a grow light
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my HS science class as grow lights. Wait til they make a better wifi for this. We just could not get the app to work at all. Plus I didn't realize you had to buy the switch AND the wifi adapter SEPARATELY. NOT worth doing. BUT, for $30 each, I do consider it a good alternative for a grow light. Buy those metal chicken feeder light cans and they work great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: We got this for Black Friday and love it. We use the hub to connect other ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this for Black Friday and love it. We use the hub to connect other Sylvania and Phillips GE light bulbs. We also connected the Kasa switches. They all are controlled by our Echo Dot (the bomb as well) and we can also control them from our phone/tablet/laptop/computer. I would suggest getting a starter kit that will pair with the Echo.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Constant malfunctions and the company does not do a good job of working with Alexa, nor do their new devices work with their old devices. Latest update does not even work with Alexa at all. I’ve spent probably over 100$ finally decided tot was a waste of money. This company intentionally breaks their stuff so that you’ll buy new. Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: Baines Deal

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased the gateway and 3 light bulbs to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the gateway and 3 light bulbs to experiment with this product - and the product will NOT let me register (or create and account). I've contacted their support for help but I have befuddled them - they do not know why I cannot create an account - for 2 weeks now. AND after reading the other reviews, I am wondering if this whole system is sound. Bottom line here is - buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C
